tool_description: Performs comprehensive quality control checks on catalog records, identifying inconsistencies, missing elements, formatting errors, and compliance issues with cataloging standards.

catalog_record.description: The catalog record to be checked for quality issues

record_format.description: Format of the input record: MARC, Dublin Core, MODS, or EAD

check_completeness.description: Whether to verify presence of required and recommended fields

check_consistency.description: Whether to check for internal consistency and logical relationships

check_authorities.description: Whether to verify headings against authority files

severity_level.description: Minimum issue severity to report: info, warning, error, critical

error_messages: Empty catalog record: Provide a valid catalog record for quality checking
Unsupported record format: Use MARC, Dublin Core, MODS, or EAD
Invalid severity level: Use info, warning, error, or critical
Malformed record structure: Record does not conform to specified format
Quality check failed: Unable to complete quality assessment due to system error
usage: Provide catalog_record and record_format to perform quality checks. Enable check_completeness, check_consistency, and check_authorities as needed. Set severity_level to control detail of reported issues.

critical_issues.description: Array of critical issues that must be resolved

completeness_score.description: Completeness score based on required and optional fields
